Summary: Helical smoke trail over S Korea
divs: Sighting DetailsPilot flying into Soeul Inchon Airport. From an altitude of 37000 ft two smoketrails were seen at an elevation starting at about 40 deg up descending to about10 deg up before dissapating. The motion was a helical flight (corkscrew) andnot particularly fast. It looked like space junk reentering. The whole eventlasted about 10 mins. These photos were taken about 5 mins after firstsighting. The flight pattern looked like the flight of the shuttle SRBs afterseparation. The times quoted are UTC (GMT).I cannot find how to attach theImages!
